title: broken xml in appinfo/info.xml
body:
i'm currently writing a schema to validate the xml files and detect improperly configured apps. the \<public\> and \<remote\> and children of \<types\> are invalid xml and cant be validated

for minimal breakage ive chosen the following possible xml:

```xml
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<info>
	<id>files</id>
	<name>files</name>
	<description>file management</description>
	<licence>agpl</licence>
	<author>robin appelman</author>
	<require>4.93</require>
	<shipped>true</shipped>
	<standalone/>
	<default_enable/>
	<types>
		<type>filesystem</type>
        </types>
        <remote>
            <file id="calendar">test.php</file>
        </remote>
        <public>
            <file id="calendar">test.php</file>
        </public>
</info>
```

heres the schema:

```xml
<xs:schema attributeformdefault="unqualified" elementformdefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/xmlschema">

  <!-- types -->
  <xs:simpletype name="notempty">
    <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
      <xs:minlength value="1"/>
    </xs:restriction>
  </xs:simpletype>

  <xs:simpletype name="version">
    <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
      <xs:pattern value="[0-9]+(\.[0-9]+)*"/>
    </xs:restriction>
  </xs:simpletype>

  <xs:simpletype name="loweralpha">
    <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
      <xs:pattern value="[a-z]+"/>
    </xs:restriction>
  </xs:simpletype>

  <!-- actual xml -->
  <xs:element name="info">
    <xs:complextype>
      <xs:all>

        <xs:element name="id" type="loweralpha" />
        <xs:element name="name" type="notempty" />
        <xs:element name="description" type="notempty" />
        <xs:element name="licence" type="notempty" />
        <xs:element name="author" type="notempty" />

        <!-- minimum owncloud version -->
        <xs:element name="require" type="version" />

        <!-- if the app can be used as a webapp for instance by gnome web -->
        <xs:element name="standalone" minoccurs="0" maxoccurs="1"/>

        <!-- if the app is in the installed tar, 3rdparty apps must set false -->
        <xs:element name="shipped" type="xs:boolean" minoccurs="0" maxoccurs="1"/>

        <!-- if the app should be enabled by default -->
        <xs:element name="default_enable" minoccurs="0" maxoccurs="1"/>
        
        <!-- types can be given and be only of value: 
          * filesystem
          * prelogin 
          * authentication
          * logging
        -->
        <xs:element name="types" minoccurs="0" maxoccurs="1">
          <xs:complextype>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="type" minoccurs="1" maxoccurs="unbounded">
                <xs:simpletype>
                  <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
                    <xs:enumeration value="filesystem" />
                    <xs:enumeration value="prelogin" />
                    <xs:enumeration value="authentication" />
                    <xs:enumeration value="logging" />
                  </xs:restriction>
                </xs:simpletype>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complextype>
        </xs:element>

        <xs:element name="remote" minoccurs="0" maxoccurs="1">
          <xs:complextype>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="file" minoccurs="1" maxoccurs="unbounded">
                <xs:complextype>
                  <xs:simplecontent>
                    <xs:extension base="notempty">
                      <xs:attribute name="id" use="required" type="xs:string" />
                    </xs:extension>
                  </xs:simplecontent>
                </xs:complextype>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complextype>
        </xs:element>

        <xs:element name="public" minoccurs="0" maxoccurs="1">
          <xs:complextype>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="file" minoccurs="1" maxoccurs="unbounded">
                <xs:complextype>
                  <xs:simplecontent>
                    <xs:extension base="notempty">
                      <xs:attribute name="id" use="required" type="xs:string" />
                    </xs:extension>
                  </xs:simplecontent>
                </xs:complextype>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complextype>
        </xs:element>

      </xs:all>
    </xs:complextype>
  </xs:element>


</xs:schema>
```
